ColdTrack is the leading tech-enabled third-party fulfillment platform for B2C and B2B eCommerce businesses with capabilities that include: bespoke pick-and-pack fulfillment, proprietary route optimization software, and enterprise shipping services across national and regional carriers.Headquartered in Edison, NJ with locations in Stockton, CA,
READ MORE
Products and Services
Powered by AI
Edit Products and Services Section
Product Name
  Product Description
  Pack Operations as a Service
Provides pick-and-pack services with temperature-controlled warehouses, label printing, palletization, and coordination of daily carrier pick-ups.Ship Software as a Service
Offers perishable route optimization technology, live parcel tracking, and carrier relationship management to improve on-time performance and reduce shipping costs.ColdTrack Live
A real-time data platform for managing fulfillment status, inventory levels, and billing details across ambient, refrigerated, and frozen products.Temperature-Controlled Warehousing
Nationwide distribution centers with over 1 million square feet of space for frozen, refrigerated, and ambient storage, designed for perishable fulfillment.Refrigerated Line Hauls
Provides zone-skip and direct-inject services into major carrier hubs with a fleet of refrigerated trucks.Lists Featuring This Company
